text: Basin might mean: *Wash basin, a bowl-shaped container used for washing hands or food *Drainage basin, the area drained by a river *Oceanic basin, a low place in the Earth that holds an ocean *Sedimentary basin , like the Amazon Basin *Basin (geology) *An open, round container shaped like a bowl with sloping sides, used for holding food or liquid ==References== Category:Basic English 850 words
title: Basin
